xmsg.net package¶

Submodules¶

xmsg.net.xMsgAddress module¶

class xmsg.net.xMsgAddress.xMsgAddress(hostname='localhost', port=7771)[source]¶

xMsg network address container class.

Defines a key constructed as host:port (xMsg convention) for storing xMsgConnection objects.

host¶

String – address host

port¶

int – address port

key¶

String – address dotted notation

get_host()[source]¶

Returns the host ip address

Returns:host – host ip address
Return type:String
get_key()[source]¶

Returns address generated key

Returns:key – address generated key
Return type:String
get_port()[source]¶

Returns the address port

Returns:port – host port
Return type:int
set_port(port)[source]¶

Sets the address port

Parameters:port (int) – address port

xmsg.net.xMsgConnection module¶

class xmsg.net.xMsgConnection.xMsgConnection(address='undefined')[source]¶

xMsg connection class

Contains xMSgAddress object and two zmq socket objects for publishing and subscribing xMsg messages respectfully.

address¶

xMsgAddress – xMsg address object

pub_sock¶

zmq.Socket – connection PUB socket

sub_sock¶

zmq.Socket – connection SUB socket

get_address()[source]¶

Returns connection address

Returns:address – connection address
Return type:xMsgAddress
get_pub_sock()[source]¶

Returns xMsg PUB socket

Returns:pub_sock – connection PUB socket
Return type:zmq.Socket
get_sub_sock()[source]¶

Returns xMsg SUB socket

Returns:sub_sock – connection SUB socket
Return type:zmq.Socket
set_address(address)[source]¶

Sets the connection address

Parameters:address (xMsgAddress) – xMsg address object
set_pub_sock(socket)[source]¶

Returns xMsg PUB socket

Parameters:socket (zmq.Socket) – connection PUB socket
set_sub_sock(socket)[source]¶

Returns xMSg SUB socket

Parameters:socket (zmq.Socket) – connection SUB socket
